docs.snippet: A period of declining price levels, with a consequent serious world depression in business, is likely to develop, according to the current monthly letter of the Royal Bank of Canada, if the central banks of the world insist on maintaining their...
docs.lead_paragraph: A period of declining price levels, with a consequent serious world depression in business, is likely to develop, according to the current monthly letter of the Royal Bank of Canada, if the central banks of the world insist on maintaining their present standards of gold reserves.
docs.abstract: Royal Bank of Canada urges concentration in central banks of leading financial countries to control level of commodity prices

headline.main: URGES COOPERATION FOR GOLD CONTROL; Royal Bank of Canada Sees Drop in Prices Likely if Present Reserve Standards Continue. FEARFUL OF A SHORTAGE Greater Concentration of Metal in Central Banks of Financially Important Nations Proposed. Urges Concentration of Gold. Case of Argentina.

docs.snippet: GENEVA, Feb. 14.--The United States arbitration treaties registered with the League of Nations loom large in the statistical survey for 1929, published today by the judicial section on the development of procedure for the pacific settlement of...
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, Feb. 14.--The United States arbitration treaties registered with the League of Nations loom large in the statistical survey for 1929, published today by the judicial section on the development of procedure for the pacific settlement of factional disputes.

headline.main: AMERICA HAS LEAD IN PACTS AT GENEVA; She Registered 20 Arbitration Treaties With the League in 1929 Out of Total of 34. RUSSIA IS DOWN FOR ONE Nations Show Tendency to Avoid Reservations and to Accept World Court's Jurisdiction.

headline.main: MARKETS NOT RIGHT TO START EXPORTING; Banker Explains That Foreign Fields Are Suffering From Price Drops. STUDY URGED FOR PRESENT To Prepare for Future Activity; Tactful Attitude Needed Now on "Slow" Accounts.
